data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Munir, Misbahul, Hamidy, Amir, Farajallah, Achmad, Smith, Eric N. (2018): A New Megophrys Kuhl and Van Hasselt (Amphibia: Megophryidae) from southwestern Sumatra, Indonesia. Zootaxa 4442 (3): 389-412, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4442.3.3|4 occurrences
